Introduction

Lee Dong Hyuck, best known by his stage name Haechan, is a member of the boy group NCT. He is the lead vocalist, lead dancer, and youngest member of its sub-unit NCT 127 while he is the main vocalist and lead dancer in NCT Dream.

On August 24, 2016, Haechan debuted in NCT Dream, the third sub-unit of NCT.

Fun facts

1
His stage name Haechan is broken down as Hae means “Sun” while Chan means “full”. So his stage name means "Full Sun".
…
2
Haechan has poor color vision and he struggles with distinguishing different colors.
…
3
Haechan has a younger sister and two younger brothers.
…
4
Haechan was announced as a NCT U member for the STATION X special release, on December 10, 2019.
…
5
Haechan was born in Seoul, but moved to Jeju when he was 7 through to the age of 12.
…
6
One of Haechan's favorite colors is Black.
…
7
In 2018, Haechan fractured a shinbone on his right leg while preparing for upcoming performances and was at the hospital, he was excluded from all schedules while he recovered.
…
8
Haechan's favorite Disney movie is The Lion King.
…
9
Haechan's audition song was “Hello” by Huh Gak.
…
10
Haechan likes medium rare steak.
…
